body: This feels strange... So authors now making a doujins off of other authors
A Doujin about a Doujin author, nice
Been waiting for this. Half jarring, knowing how masculine the voice is but I shall persevere.

>>Japple

Life Ito, a Babiniku Vtuber and also an illustrator. The guy draws himself like that big booty cow girl, cuz he wanna appear on other V's live stream and to work with them.
This book is written by his friend Arato Asato, is an well known illustrator as drawing fanarts of a lot of Vtubers like Tamaki Inuyama, Nobuhime Oda and something like that.
